MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G76 postcode area of Eaglesham. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:00pm due to a damaged underground cable, caused by a third party and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:35pm on Friday, 16 April 2021
